layer.abstract: This image service contains an IKONOS scene for the Toronto city, Ontario, Canada. This service provides dynamic access to the on-the-fly pansharpened 1-meter resolution satellite imagery, as well as access to the pre-generated natural color cache tiles. The service also supports height mensuration. The service has four bands: blue, green, red, and near-infrared. Source: GeoEye Inc. Esri reserves the right to change or remove this service at any time and without notice.
